answers.answer: Marti - I can understand your concern as many of us type 2 Diabetics have gone through the same feelings as are you are today. The good news is Diabetes is controllable and does not have to be life threatening as long as you become proactive in your treatment. Below are some good sources for information and control of Diabetes. Good luck and good health to you.http://www.diabetes.org/type-2-diabetes.jsphttp://www.nlm.nih.gov/medlineplus/ency/article/000313.htmhttp://diabetes.niddk.nih.gov/dm/pubs/type1and2/index.htm
Im new aswell, its all very confusing
